snippet: While the nation has been enamored with Kentucky and its eye-popping talent, a statistical analysis for The Quad maintained throughout the past month that Kansas was also one of the teams most likely to win the men's college basketball championship.
abstract: While the nation has been enamored with Kentucky and its eye-popping talent, a statistical analysis for The Quad maintained throughout the past month that Kansas was also one of the teams most likely to win the men's college basketball championship.

headline.main: Kentucky-Kansas: A Look at the Numbers
